titleStmt.title: A comfortable sermon of faith, in temptations and afflictions Preached at S. Botulphes wythout Aldersgate in London, the .xv. of Februarye. 1573. By Maister VVilliam Fulke, Doctor of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Fulke, William, 1538-1589.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Awdeley, dwellying in little Brittaine streete without Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A comfortable sermon of fayth, in temptacions and afflictions.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
